title: Atikur0011
author: Atikur0011
content: Bitcoin Historical Data in 23 November 2023 to 02 December 2023.  this graph

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: You can have price for Bitcoin with many big websites like Coinmarketcap, Coingecko and it provides more information like Trading volume, and more.https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/bitcoin/https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/bitcoinYou can get more with Tradingview.com with some technical indicators even you only use a free account.

comments.author: Mrbluntzy
comments.body: OP, this topic is very unnecessary because the price of Bitcoin for the past month or even the past years can be track through some so many tracking site like tcoingecko, coinmarketcap, finance.yahoo and statmuse.com. it's a very easy thing that anyone can just search if they need that information but now that you provided it, I don't see any use of it here.
